# Join the COReS Community

::: {.callout-note}
This is a summary of our community membership. For detailed information, download our comprehensive [Community Guide (PDF)](#).
:::

## Our Vision
COReS brings together diverse stakeholders to build a strong open research community around preclinical systematic review. We welcome contributions and perspectives from all interested parties to shape the future of preclinical research and translation.

## Who Can Join?

:::: {.grid}
::: {.g-col-6}
### Research Roles
- Researchers (all levels)
- Master and PhD students
- Postdoctoral researchers
- Principal Investigators
- Research support staff
:::

::: {.g-col-6}
### Specialist Roles
- Systematic review methodologists
- Librarians/Information specialists
- Statisticians
- Open Science officers
- Lab managers
:::
::::

## Benefits of Joining

::: {.callout-tip}
## Free Membership
All community resources and discussions are freely accessible to members
:::

### Community Resources
- Active discussion forum on Zulip
- Regular newsletter updates
- Access to training materials
- Invitation to community events

### Professional Development
- Network with peers
- Find collaboration partners
- Access training opportunities
- Join working groups

## How to Get Involved

1. **Join Our Discussion Forum**
   - Sign up at [cores.zulipchat.com](https://cores.zulipchat.com)
   - Follow our [Zulip quick start guide](/about-cores/using-zulip.qmd)

2. **Stay Connected**
   - Subscribe to our [newsletter](http://eepurl.com/h4hsMv)
   - Follow our [events calendar](/events.qmd)
   - Access our [e-learning platform](https://elearning.camarades.net/)

3. **Participate**
   - Introduce yourself in the community
   - Join discussions
   - Attend virtual or in-person events
   - Engage in training opportunities

## Community Guidelines
All members must:
- Follow our [Code of Conduct](/about-cores/code-of-conduct.qmd)
- Adhere to our [EDI Policy](/about-cores/policies.qmd)
- Contribute respectfully to discussions
- Share knowledge and experiences

::: {.callout-important}
## Ready to Join?
1. Sign up on our [Zulip forum](https://cores.zulipchat.com)
2. Complete the new member introduction
3. Start engaging with the community!
:::
